While the prices may be higher for the convenience of being able to shop from home, the significant amount of donations received by this company should outway the labor costs of uploading the items to the site. Don‚Äôt waste your money here, go to your local thrift store and support small local businesses.

Poor pay out rate.: I‚Äôve sent 3 clean-out bags and the processing rate is extremely slow. I don‚Äôt understand what takes so long anyway, but I am keeping my mouth shut. Researched heavily on how much people made and I got really nervous. I have placed at least 35 articles of clothing in each bag, all neatly folded and cleaned, along with name brands and great brands. Hoping that my pay-out isn‚Äôt low as the people who made $3 when they stuffed the bag to the brim. STAY AWAY.

UPDATE!!

I have received, and get this, $2.95 for ONE bag. Seriously??? I couldn‚Äôt even buy a sandwich for that price at a local gas station... unbelievable...

Not for sellers!: So I sent out one bags with Kate Spade, Coach cross-bag and purses and some quality clothes that I wore a couple times. And another bag was filled with shoes and casual/office clothes. Because of my friends' recommendation, I was expecting to receive at least $100 after processing fees and others. NONE! I DO NOT recommend. Don't need to waste money and time for your good clothes and bags. I rather to send to Goodwill or donation program for tax deduction.

Cheap interest? I don't think so for second hand: The clothes are a ok price, if you you go to a second hand store and find same brand, the prices are cheaper and you don't have to wait for shipping. New 2 thredUP: This is the second time I order, and I am back because all the things my daughter and I purchased the first time were in excellent condition.

The best!!!: I will only buy from this app and website for the rest of my life. ThredUP review: As long as you read descriptions and Google the brand to compare prices you can find some good deals as any other second hand service.

Love buying clothes!: This app makes buying clothes easy! The clothes are ‚Äúsecond hand‚Äù, but often still have the tags still on them or look brand new. Not happy: Lately it seems like prices have gone up. Also I just sent in a bag to sell and the pay out is ridiculously low for pieces they are selling at 3-4 times the price. Good, but...: I have purchased several times from this source, and find both pluses and minuses:

PLUS

- good selection of clothing at good prices. The ‚Äúlike new‚Äù products are really like new. 
- easy to return (although it takes a long time for them to generate a return slip)

MINUS

- customer service not very responsive
- the filters are often unhelpful.  They either omit products that should fall within the filter category or they include products that don‚Äôt fall within the category. That forces you to minimize filters and go through a long listing of products that do not fit your search.  

I must say, though, that this app can be addictive especially if you return an item and build a credit. I inevitably buy more clothes than I need. But that‚Äôs my problem.

Good app. But you don‚Äôt get much cash: The app and website are slick and easy to use, the clean out bag process is easy. However, be prepared to get very little for your products, even for higher end products. We‚Äôve sold through ThredUp twice now. For example, a Hanna Anderson girls dress merits me .50 while they sell it for $15. You are better off going to a local consignment shop.

Logs out account every time you reopen the app: You can‚Äôt seriously expect users to log back in every time the app reopens. Sometimes it‚Äôs just switching between apps and you‚Äôll get logged out. My Go to store: ThredUP is terrific. Easy to navigate, great filters to make searching for something specific even easier, tons of choices, quick turn around, excellent customer service‚Ä¶ ThredUP is where I go first when I need something to wear.

Charges to sell have gotten to high: The charge for the clean out and the amount they price some of my items most recently, one made me wonder if they were marking some artificial low to allow an employee to buy them, two made it clear I will not make anything on the items I sent in that took months to process, and lastly means I won‚Äôt be using thread up any more and will take items to our local children‚Äôs consignment shop.

Rip off: Please read their clause carefully before sending your name brand clothing to them. It takes them over three months to complete your clean out so it‚Äôs available on their website for sell. Items in terrible shape but listed as minor wear: Great idea‚Ä¶ terrible execution. Had a $43 ‚Äúcredit‚Äù, there was a discount, and I still spent $125 on wool items. Better off buying new. Super ez and friendly mobile app use: I really like it because it simple and shop anywhere and anytime. Payment process is nice and sometimes app Notification tells you a good deal. They also tell you their HQ updates and news about impact and sustainability. Love it! Thank you!

Terrible.: I‚Äôve given thredUP multiple chances, but no more. They take 100 years to process your bags, and then list 5 out of 20 items at ridiculously overpriced prices, but only pay you out a couple bucks.

I‚Äôm FedUp with ThredUp!: I‚Äôve been using ThredUp for years to buy and sell and I‚Äôm now FedUp with it. So happy!: Really made my day, all my purchases were outstanding!

Love thredUP: ThredUP is my new favorite shop. I get so many amazing pieces in excellent condition. I‚Äôve purchased Athleta, lululemon, aqua, joie, dkny, nux, Zella, and more at really good prices. Pros and Cons: My go-to shopping app 

Pros 
- good deals and overall reasonably priced 
- environmentally friendly 
- well packaged, items are never too dirty 
- great app for filters and searching 
- my go-to for shopping 

Cons 
- shipping sometimes takes weeks instead of 3-6 days to consolidate order with minimal customer support 
- they track your contacts in the app‚Ä¶ why would they need this data? Seems creepy. 
- clothing isn‚Äôt always great quality can be seen through or super funky even though it‚Äôs priced like new clothes 
- some cheaply made clothes / fast fashion is priced higher than it would be new, like forever 21, Shien, etc.

Amazing experience: On the whim I decided to order a handful of dresses since after a great additional discount they all came to what one single dress would have been retail, and I‚Äôm SO pleased. This is what shopping should be: I love shopping here. It‚Äôs convenient and I know that I‚Äôm getting good quality at a great price. Why NO Customer Service?: Customer service is pretty much nonexistent. I‚Äôve been waiting for an order for over two weeks and it‚Äôs still sitting in Indiana and I live in California. Shipping really needs to improve: I‚Äôm not concerned with the amount of time it took for my items to arrive; it was the lack of updated communication via the tracking link supplied. Don‚Äôt sell with them: I have sold through Thred Up in the past and it‚Äôs been fine. Great clothes great prices: Great quality clothes at great prices.  Love that you can get something a little used that is great quality for cheaper than some new poorer quality clothes. Buy used - it‚Äôs the smart way to shop!: I love this app! I‚Äôve been using it for a couple years now and have bought numerous things - all exactly as described and all arriving on time. Their prices went up which makes them just like all the other websites :(: I LOVE ThredUP and have more than 1 account that I order from for tax purposes. Thrift Shopping at Home: I‚Äôm having so much fun. When I go to a thrift store, I have my game face on. I inspect clothes for holes or marks to make sure that I can actually wear the piece. I really love the fact that I can trust the garments will be as described.

Start to hate this app: I hate that they don‚Äôt give you enough time to hold items and when you click on add to cart it ends up in someone‚Äôs cart. There shipping stinks. When you contact them they don‚Äôt contact you back. I ordered a ring with one of my orders and I contacted them and never got my ring or a refund or anything from them.

Why didn't someone think of this sooner?: Great app for cleaning out the closets. They don't pay a whole lot for your items unless they're high end. Horrible customer service.: Needing a few dresses for wedding season I placed 2 orders with several items each.
They came in about 6 different packages over the course of about 2 weeks. 
Unfortunately I needed to return quite a few of them. There‚Äôs no number to call, the live chat option never connected me to a person, and 3 emails over a weeks time went without and answer. When someone finally did answer me, EVERY item I was sending back had been marked down for my refund! I like the idea of buying used, but the return process is a joke.

Shop Elsewhere Quality is a Joke: Was so excited for my first purchase. Ordered 3 dresses. All of which were detailed as a like new or brand new with tags‚Ä¶ One dress was so tattered and torn I had to throw it away. The second dress had so much static that it wouldn‚Äôt uncling from itself and could not be worn. The third dress was described as XL and came in small.

Returning these purchases cost more than the total purchase itself. No one cared when I called or emailed. No one tried to correct the wrong sizes. I was told tough luck. 

Clean up bag. Sent 22 items all in far better condition than the clothing I purchased. All new within the past year and definitely within the outdated fashion items I have seen online. Three of my items had never been worn. I received $2.30 for 6 items. What a joke.

I have not had one decent experience with this company. Done, deleted, will NEVER USE OR RECOMMEND again.

Seller Beware!: I have used thred-up for years, but for the past year I have been less than impressed. Shopping success!: I love this app! You never know what you‚Äôre going to find, which makes it all the more fun! My only complaint is the pictures of listed wallets. It would be great to see pictures of the wallets opened so we know what it looks like on the inside and if it‚Äôs a trifold or not.

Who are these people hiring?: This app is great as a concept. Not so great in reality. I would LOVE to say amazing things. But simply put? It‚Äôs terrible.

Their measuring is all over the place. For shoes, no length measurement (heel to toe) on heel height. I could have two of the same exact shirt and size and the bust will be like 5‚Äù apart. Same with jeans. And they don‚Äôt include the name of the type of jean per brand in the description. Idk who they hired to measure these clothes or enter the measurement data, but it is the sole reason I refuse to buy anything or become hesitant to buy anything from this app. 

I will gladly get hired on to run your measurement department. You fix that, you make more money. 

I‚Äôm blown away by how frustratingly overlooked that detail is. Online thrifters are OCD about having measurements readily available. #1 question asked on any listing on any site. 

I mean‚Ä¶ come on.

But when they mark it up it is worth almost 15-20 times more on their app. Ripping the  seller off. Not just that but they overcharge their items. You can purchase some of the items on here for the the same price sometimes even cheaper and New directly from the store. Not counting the additional shipping costs for this website. Don‚Äôt waste your time with this app!

Great app,love the clothes: Sometimes things take too long to arrive.  And it‚Äôs hard to predict how long it will take.  Even if 2 or more items are coming from the same place...they can arrive at widely different times.  

Also, I‚Äôd appreciate better comments on what materials items are made if and more discription on flaws.  And more pictures of each item.

Customer Service is Not Helpful: So disappointed with thredUP‚Äôs customer service! I contacted them via the chat for help researching why my package had not moved from the FedEx SLC shipping location in the last 6 days. I was told by Matt to look on the tracking info for updated info. REALLY???  That‚Äôs exactly how I found that the item was in SLC & had been there for the last 6 days. Such a waste of my time contacting thredUP & so very frustrating. These reps need to be trained in customer service and to actually research the customers issue before responding with a ridiculous answer!

The only way I shop: I recommend ThredUP to everyone I know. I always get so many compliments on my outfits! ThredUP has so many different options available for any occasion and budget. Would Never Sell Again: My purchasing experience was positive. Next time I‚Äôll stick with selling my items myself on Poshmark.  While I have to put more effort in, the payoff is 4x what I would get thru ThredUP. I‚Äôd rather donate all my clothes than sell to ThredUP again.  I‚Äôm hoping I get at least something for the items of mine they have now.

Don‚Äôt believe the high ratings: Boy, do I feel angry about this service. I feel super scammed. I sent about $1000 in brand new (tags on) clothes I got from Target & H&M that were bought within the past year.

U have the option to get items that aren‚Äôt approved sent back to u. I thought, they would at least take every single one of the brand new tags-on items. Got $20 for what DID sell, & they kept the ones that didn‚Äôt sell to be resold (if I didn‚Äôt claim within 13 days)

I WILL NEVER EVER USE THIS SERVICE, AGAIN!

If I had taken a grocery bag of my clothes on a shopping trip to h&M, I would have received 20% off from their recycling program, which PAYS ME MORE than ThredUp did.

What a waste of time and A LOT of money.
BEWARE!!!

Love my Thredup App: Super easy to use. The search feature is great and allows me to see quickly what‚Äôs new in the name brands I‚Äôm interested in. Heidi (in South Lake Tahoe)

Great place to get clothes: Prices have gone up recently which I think they are trying to smooth over by offering discounts. Still, it is possible to find really great things at good prices. DO NOT SELL...total rip off.: If you sell on this site, you‚Äôre 1000% getting ripped off. It doesn‚Äôt make any sense how little they give you for your items (think less than $1 for brand new items) and then they turn around and sell it for exponentially more on their site. Don‚Äôt want to support a company like that. Go to Poshmark or Mercari. You are in waaaaay more control of how much you make you will make A LOT more!

High prices and return fees: Prices have skyrocketed! Who wants to pay $10 or more for used leggings??? And now there's a fee for "restocking" returned items?! Wrong, wrong, wrong!: I purchased a really cute Womens size 12 dress. When it arrived it was way, way, way too small - perhaps a girls size 12? I know my size.

love love love the app otherwise.

Great!: I‚Äôm always very Leary about buying clothes these online. Different sizes for different manufacturers etc... But, guess what? Every piece I have purchased is perfect.,üíÉüíÉ
Fits well and looks great. I lost 50 lbs last yr and like close to fit my to show off my new body but not too much. And $$$$& is on the mark. Very reasonable. Hood quality. I‚Äôll be back.

Convenient, but disappointing sometimes: I ordered 3 sweaters. 2 of them came, and the order form had the third one crossed out, with the word ‚Äúrefunded‚Äù written next to it in pencil. I wish I would have known that it wasn‚Äôt coming so I could have ordered a different sweater instead. I don‚Äôt want to place another order and have to pay for more shipping. Love it! Great for buying and clean-out: The ultimate thrift store. Quality Ratings and measurements are consistently accurate. I have to restrain myself from buying more and cluttering my closet!

Great but use caution: The ap is easy to navigate and very user friendly. Items are screened well for quality. I like using the ap and am happy with most of my items. MR: I don't like to spend a lot of money on clothes.  I love having the option of buying used clothing to keep costs down.  I also like that I can send in my used items to get some money back.  My only frustration is that I wish they would give more details for each item:  does it have pockets, is it waterproof,  fully or partially lined.  I like to know what I am buying.  I need details.

Read reviews-Learn From My Mistake: I sent in a bag with some of the items still having tags.  It took 2 months to process the bag.  They "accepted" 8 of my items none of which were the new with tag items.

My available cash out is $1.34 If I cash out with a transfer to PayPal, when all is said and done I would end up with $1.31!  So basically they paid me less than 1.5% of what my items sold for!  Do not waste your time with these people!!!!!

I buy most of my clothes here‚Ä¶: I love the ‚Äúmy sizes‚Äù settings, I love how you can sort by brand AND fabric! I‚Äôve certainly found a lot of gems this way. No measurements listed, sneaky policy, terrible search features: They need to include exact sizing measurements in item descriptions but they do not do that. Then when you get an item that doesn‚Äôt fit they tell you it‚Äôs returnable but neglect to say they are going to charge you $11 for a shipping label out of the refund. The search feature is terrible and seldom provides anything remotely similar to what you are looking for. It also does not save ‚Äúsaved sizes‚Äù so you have to re enter them every time you search.

The percentage: I think that the percentage that they take is too high. They don‚Äôt send a massage once it‚Äôs ready to sale. Once the sale start it should send a notification on the time limit you have to change the prices if you want. Because you can change them but only after so many days after processing is complete. I‚Äôm looking for a better way to sale and still make good money for my items.

Misinformed customer service: the app and I noticed when I placed the order the address change did not update . 

I contacted thredUP right away on the day the order was placed  via email and chat service regarding the address change via email & thredUP never responded to my emails from last week. 

I contacted chat with a response that as long as I changed my address via USPS it should be fine ‚Ä¶ thred up reassured me there was nothing to worry about. this info was also in the website .

I have changed my address via USPS however the package via fedex which will mean it wouldn‚Äôt matter as usps address changes won‚Äôt effect fedex packages . 

The app made a mistake and customer service is no help - there is no number to call and chat service gave me misinformation / no number to call

It‚Äôs love/hate: I don‚Äôt want to be apart of fast fashion or the abuses of the clothing industry. However my kids and I need clothes. Train Wreck: This company is a train wreck. Addictive: Now 80% of my wardrobe is thrifted things to throw it up. You find such great prices for such great quality depending on what you want to find. I think it‚Äôs honestly the best way to shop instead of going to big companies and definitely you can be watching your carbon footprint.

Gone downhill: Shopping on this app has become so difficult compared to what it used to be, and it makes me sad. Yessss: I love to thrift my clothes but don‚Äôt have a good place anywhere close. This app allows me to buy without having to go in and sort through stuff. Products can be sorted my specific measurements. Fast shipping. Can‚Äôt wait to try clearing out my closet with them so I have room for more.

Purses and wallets: I have bought a purse and wallet from thred up. The items I purchased looked so good I thought they were new. I am now able to enjoy nicer things for a fraction of the cost. Awful for selling: If you‚Äôre looking to sell some great quality items and make a some extra cash, THIS IS NOT THE PLACE TO DO IT. Their payout is very very low. Sorting better: I wish there would be better way to sort. Maybe have more options. I only buy long sleeves blouses because it‚Äôs what we are allowed at work. I find myself looking at 100‚Äôs of top to get just a couple of the ones I need.

Love it... but...: As a seller, I love the app. I'd love more access to what I've submitted and its status.

Horrible customer service: I am done with this company. This is the third time I‚Äôve been sent a clothing item that doesn‚Äôt even closely match the picture. Great product and good search navigation on this site.: Good searching, love the variety and quality I find. I enjoy seeing photos of my sales and tracking them. I love getting paid with store credit. I feel my items I sell are going to good homes.

Clearly not the same service it was to start: I have used thredUP for several clean outs, unfortunately, they have become extremely negligent with who works there evaluating the bags. Great spot to shop: I‚Äôve been using this for a few months and love ThredUP! Have recommended to several friends.

One recent bug: it logs me out now frequently, and didn‚Äôt before. Because of this, it prompts me constantly to sign in and it‚Äôs hard to use to casually browse now. Please fix :) app has been outstanding beyond this.

Dishonest descriptions: This is my second order with Thred-Up and my last. Both orders had items with extremely vague descriptions of ‚Äúminor wear.‚Äù Minor wear is light wear throughout to pilling or even a pin size hole.  Thred-Up‚Äôs minor wear is biohazard armpit stains that smell so bad you have to throw away, and large holes that can‚Äôt be seen in photos. That‚Äôs why the photos are so blurry, they don‚Äôt want you seeing the flaws. Customer service is terrible as you never get help and receive auto message replies that do not apply to you.

Bang for your Buck: I love shopping on line. The one thing you need to know is your measurements, because the sizing in clothes is subjective. Each item has the measurement listed with the size. Even extra large is too small for my chest. I like quality clothes at a reasonable price.

Made my phone overheat: After downloading this app, I had issues with my phone losing battery and overheating. Good buys on clothes you love: Love shopping here, but info on an item is a bit vague. I just bought a coat for $60 which stated ‚Äúminor wear on fabric‚Äù. Love thredUP!: ThredUP is my go to for clothes shopping. My nieces think I'm cool for shopping "pre-worn". I'm helping the planet. I really appreciate the fact you can purchase multiple items with only one shipping charge; unlike so many other "pre-worn" sites. Thanks thredUP!!!!

Amazing Shopping Experience: I am thoroughly enjoying purchasing from ThreadUp.  Everything I have received is high quality, in excellent condition, and fits well.   Shipping is fast and I especially appreciate the ‚Äúbundle shipping‚Äù where I can shop for a week and it‚Äôs all sent out at once.  I‚Äôve been recommending ThreadUp to my friends.

Uhhh pretty expensive: I love the idea of recycling clothes for others! It is amazing. Satisfied Customer: I received my first box 2 weeks ago and I absolutely loved the items I was sent. Although I didn‚Äôt keep everything I was completely satisfied! I have already placed an order for my 2nd box! Can‚Äôt wait to see everything!

Very happy customer: Amazing customer service! I noticed an item in my order was not as advertised, and it was outside of their return policy. I reached out to them. So many good things to say!: I‚Äôve had only great experiences shopping with ThredUP! Not always as expected: The pictures and descriptions the website provides do not always give the full description of an item. For example: a shirt may say it‚Äôs a 3/4 sleeve but when you receive it, its actually a ‚Äúcold shoulder ‚Äú. Or a shirt that looks solid in the picture and says it‚Äôs just one color actually has a small print in another. The prices are good but shopping on this site is definitely hit or miss!

Great bargains: Everything I have ordered has been in great condition. My only complaint would be sending cloths to them they just offer enough compensation I had sent in at least $500 worth of higher end cloths and many had new tags, my compensation was $15. No deals: This is not a way to save money on clothing. More often than not, items are listed for prices ABOVE what they originally cost at retail. All they promise and SO MUCH MORE: I have been using ThredUP for a couple of months.  
All I can say is: Just try it. Now.  You are likely to be blown away with the deals, quality and over-the-top customer service.  Example: they pay for shipping on returns!

There is so much to love.  Topped off by almost all easily recyclable paper-based packaging.

Love the site but....: Love thredUP, however over the past few years the prices have been going up, promo codes are fewer and farther between, and just last week I noticed that the minimum purchase for shipping went up to $79. My purchases have become more planned or on as as need basis instead of a fun, inexpensive, impulse buy.

Pretty great, could be even better!: I wish I could save different ‚Äúmy sizes‚Äù for tops and bottoms since I wear different sizes in those two areas it would make filtering and browsing easier. I also wish I could browse more common brands rather than have to type them in. 

Overall I like using the app and the site. It makes thrifting and shopping 2nd hand easy.

Review: I‚Äôve enjoyed thrifty shopping my favorite brands and styles. Returns are easy. One time there was an issue with a shipment and they resolved it in a professional manner, I have bought and sold.

ThredUp: Good and user friendly

Shipping Mistake: I was told my package would come Wednesday, then it got delayed to Thursday, and it‚Äôs Thursday at 11:30pm right now and no package. My tracker still says it should be delivered Thursday. Not very punctual for my first experience. 
Shopping wise I like thredUP a lot though! Easy to navigate and prices can be good. I wish there was more photos and measurements at times though.

Search needs improvement: I‚Äôve been a patron for years. The search bar doesn‚Äôt actually search. While I recognize that I can use the filter to search by a specific brand, it takes more steps/ less than ideal experience to do so.

layout glitch: I have been using thred up for years and love it, however, when I go to add garments from my liked collection the heart icon is basically right on the clothing so when I click on the image of the clothes it unlikes what I saved and then I can‚Äôt find that piece again. Rip-off: I submitted 6 items for sale. Only 4 were listed and I don‚Äôt know what happened to the other two pieces. They were never listed nor ever returned. They pay pennies on the dollar. Love: I absolutely love this app! I find a many great deals bargains and prices. Not even for me because I have a odd shaped body but for my kids especially I find things for them I know they will look good in! I really appreciate this app and all behind it to make it happen. Thank you!!!!!!

Highly aggressive marketing emails: Every time you save a search on the app, ThredUP, automatically reenrolls you in email notifications for that search, even if you have already opted out / unsubscribed. Thrift huh!: I placed an order because I had a discount for a first time buyer and let me tell you, IF THIS is suppose to be a ‚Äúthrift‚Äù shop then it‚Äôs WAY overpriced especially for things that aren‚Äôt even name brand. Love It!: Well I was wondering how was I going to shop for some clothes but lacking the will to go shop. A friend told me about ThredUp and it‚Äôs been my go to app since! It‚Äôs a great app to have and very user friendly. The people are easy to work with if you have questions etc.

I wish I‚Äôd used it sooner!: My absolute favorite place to buy clothes. The number of quality pieces I can get for the money is incredible. It also makes it super easy to clear out my kids‚Äô closets and my own. The clean out kit is a great way to earn shipping credit. Love. Love. Love.

The app itself isn‚Äôt bad: The app isn‚Äôt bad.  The store is full of beautiful things for every taste. The only inconvenience is the return policy in particular when they send the wrong item size. They do reimburse you the money but now you have to dispose the item or donate it because you can‚Äôt return it. Which makes no sense since the whole concept is to thrift and save the planet.

Only Shop On Thred Up: I have such a hard time shopping at stores online or in person because I can never find what I‚Äôm looking. More than half of my wardrobe is from Thred Up because of their wide selection and cheap prices. So glad I found this app!

Great Selection: There are almost too many choices the inventory is so vast!  I love the variety and quality of the clothes as well as the discounts.

It‚Äôs okay.: The concept of this app is great, but the pictures offered are so low quality. I dont know if I‚Äôm looking at a cat hair, a lint, or a legit tear. You can barely make out the texture of the fabric because the pictures are so awful.

I would say overall the app is a huge waste of time. I gave it a real shot and it was so time-consuming. Even with filters it takes so much effort to find what you want. Honestly, just visit a thrift store.

Easy Thrifting: I love ThredUp!  I really enjoy being able to search for brands, patterns, and styles I like. They have great sales, rewards, and I‚Äôve been enjoying their ‚Äúshop this look‚Äù feature.  It‚Äôs a lot of fun to use the app, and I‚Äôve found some of my favorite clothing through it.

New rewards program is bad: If you‚Äôre looking for a good deal, this platform isn‚Äôt great, especially since they changed their rewards program. Obsessed with thredUP: Imagine shopping all of your favorite brands, paired down by size, style, color, etc. and in a way that‚Äôs good for the environment? That‚Äôs thredUP. App isn‚Äôt good, ThredUp is awesome: I love ThredUp. I‚Äôve sold and bought a ton of items for me and my daughter. (Crossing my fingers and hoping they‚Äôll get a side going for my husband!) I mostly just serf for new favorites with the app and wait to do everything else until I get on the website with my laptop.

Send out ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù clothes with HOLES: I don‚Äôt typically write reviews but this seems worth mentioning. I would caution people against buying from ThredUP specifically. Would recommend: I have purchased several items from threads up and everything I got was a really high-quality exactly how it was described, fit perfectly. I have no complaints. And I‚Äôm definitely going to continue to order from them in the future

Great service, and helping the planet too: Love the options of buying second hand but also having options to filter for new with tags. Clothes arrive when it says and if you have any issues with delivery customer services is very kind and helpful. Totally recommend

Deceptive Pictures: I have ordered from thredUP multiple times and probably will again. Just a warning, look closely at the photos. Poor customer service: This was my second order from thredUP. It was supposed to arrive in 2 packages. I got 1 package. Second Chance: I am trying again, i have made many purchases in the past few months...have loved many of them....unfortunately a handful of my most recent purchase have been sized incorrectly.  So I am giving you guys another chance...ü§ûüèªü§ûüèªü§ûüèª

Not as described.: The main issue I‚Äôm having when purchasing items is they are not as described. I typically search for 100% cotton or organic cotton. Simply the BEST!: I LOVE thredUP so much! So simple to shop and the clothes are on point! I‚Äôve been able to add some dream pieces to my closet and it wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without thredUP. GREAT VALUE: i saw this app advertised and thought i would download it to see what they had and i instantly found numerous things from my favorite brands!!! i have already placed an order and i‚Äôm so excited to get it in the mail! the app is user friendly and i love how you can input your own sizes to see what is available!

Disappointed: I wanted to like thredUP so bad, and I did for a while. But things have changed. Shipping is way too expensive. Additionally, I sold them clothes and made zero dollars. ThredUP is a scam: I‚Äôve used ThredUP three times, including one clean out. What they don't tell you is that when you send them your clothes, they make you pay a $15 fee- to sell your own clothes!!! I‚Äôve bought clothes from ThredUP two times and both times, the clothing quality was lower than explained in the description.

My new shopping addiction: I love everything about this company. I love shopping for clothes that come in new with tags and like-new. I love recycling through ThredUP and watching the clothes make their way to someone else who will keep them from a landfill. And the app is so easy to use.

Wonderful: I was going through a difficult time and was able to purchase items that were high quality at very reasonable prices and I was grateful that this shopping experience actually helped me greatly.

So easy to use!: I absolutely love TredUp and their app is very user-friendly and straight-forward. The clothes are nicely displayed, which I personally love and appreciate. The filter function makes it super easy to narrow down your search and find what you‚Äôre looking for. Great app!

Don‚Äôt send your clothing here: I sent my items in July. We are now into November and they have yet to even go through my items. I‚Äôm afraid my items are in limbo and I can‚Äôt get a straight answer from anyone at ThredUP and I wish I just went to my local consignment. I‚Äôm now at a 5 month mark with zero communication. false advertising: I have bought only once and everything was fine, but I have noticed that your advertising is misleading;  because when they do flash sales for high percentages, the programmers put the clothing pieces at a higher price and thus apply a 60% discount.  previously you could have your favorites for 12 hours, now only 1 hour.  very bad.  maybe in the future if things get better , i changed my review .

Need dark screen option on thread up app: I love thredup but hate that they don‚Äôt have a dark screen option on their app.  I have to search thredUP on the internet and not use the app because the white background leads to macular degeneration. This app DESTROYED my battery: I opened this app ONE TIME. I love the idea, but not the restocking fee :(: I really wanted to love thred up. The best way to shop.: I haven‚Äôt bought anything anywhere else in a while. I have purchased many high quality ‚Äúlike new‚Äù and ‚ÄúNWT‚Äù items on ThredUp. They‚Äôre quick, sustainable and premium brands. The shipping and return is great!  I will never shop fast fashion again!

My go-to!!: I spread the gospel of thredUP whenever I can. Getting to reduce the demand on our planet‚Äôs resources and give new life to existing items adds another dimension of joy to shopping!

üåüFabulous!üåü: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews for apps but this was too good and I had to share. I love shopping but sometimes I‚Äôm not look for something specific and I just want to browse.
